about_the_game:
Father Basick, a disgraced priest, awakens from his vehicle after colliding with a tree. His 11-year-old daughter is missing, and he finds himself in an unfamiliar and isolated city of Sinner's Ridge. As he sets out to find his daughter, he soon discovers that the town is full of evil lurking in the shadows of the dense fog, and that there may be more behind the reason for his arrival in Sinner's Ridge.

  • Explore an open world at your own pace
  • Choice and consequence
  • Stylized and beautiful yet horrific world
  • Puzzles
  • Immersive Sounds and Atmosphere
  • Inventory Management
  • Weapon and Skill Upgrades
  • Hidden Treasures and Collectibles
  • New Game + with bonus rewards and tons of lore to explore and secrets to find

content_descriptors.notes:
Trigger Warning:  Parts of the story in this game involve the discussion and insinuation of suicide through scenes found in the game.  Discretion is advised if this is a sensitive topic to the player.

This game also evokes depictions of horror/horror elements, the occult, demonic imagery, blood, disturbing imagery.

short_description: Explore a haunting open world as you smash and blast through lost souls, evil cultists, and horrendous creatures while attempting to find your daughter and save your soul in this first-person survival horror adventure.
